summary: Encapsulates a Yeelight Sunflower smart bulb, exposing its current status (availability, power state, brightness, color, name, and supported capabilities) and providing operations to change power, adjust settings, and synchronize state with the device.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of Yeelight Sunflower lighting into home automation or IoT platforms, allowing applications to monitor and control the bulb as part of a connected environment.
